name: New York City Payroll Analysis
description: Developing high-quality data pipelines that are dynamic, automated, and easily monitored for optimal performance for the City's financial resources.

name: Data Engineering using Azure Cloud, Databricks and dbt
description: Building a scalable, robust and efficient data pipeline using Azure Cloud services, Databricks, and dbt, structured around Medallion Architecture that transforms raw data into valuable insights.

name: Sparkify Analysis
description: Developing robust data pipelines using Apache Airflow and Amazon Redshift, focusing on dynamic, reusable tasks with easy monitoring and backfilling, while prioritizing data quality through post-ETL tests to detect discrepancies.

name: STEDI Human Balance Analysis
description: Extracting data produced by STEDI Step Trainer sensors and the mobile app, curating them into the data lakehouse solution on AWS. The data is used to train a machine learning model to detect steps accurately in real-time.

name: Divvy Bike Share Analysis
description: Developing a data lake solution using Azure Databricks and a lake house architecture to analyse the bike-share system in Chicago, USA.

name: Japan Visa Applications Analysis
description: Applying PySpark and Plotly for processing data and visualisation the trends of Japan visa applications. Spark clusters are configured within a Docker container on Azure.

name: Queensland Traffic Crash
description: Analysing traffic crash data in Queensland to understand the trends and patterns of traffic crashes. The analysis helps the government to make better decisions in road safety and traffic management.

name: Fibit
description: Analysing Fibit data to understand user's activity and sleep patterns, and provide recommendations to improve their health and fitness levels.

name: Domino's Pizza Sales
description: Analysing Domino's Pizza sales data to understand the sales trend and customer behaviour. The analysis helps the company to make better decisions in marketing and sales strategies.

name: SpaceX
description: Final capstone project for IBM Professional Certificate in Data Science.

name: Titanic Survival Prediction
description: Applying PySpark and machine learning algorithms to predict the survival of passengers on the Titanic.

name: Programming Languages Trends Analysis
description: Analysing the trends of programming languages based on the data from Stack Overflow. Understanding the popularity of programming languages to help developers make better decisions.

name: E-commerce Backend API
description: Building a RESTful API for e-commerce system using Python FastAPI.
